ygData.msgSnippet: Ice:: She frowned as she could tell how he felt. She nodded and sighed. We will get them back for hurting our friends. She smiled as he asked about her

Ice::

She frowned as she could tell how he felt. She nodded and sighed."We 
will get them back for hurting our friends."

She smiled as he asked about her powers. She chuckled,"Actually, I'm 
getting better every day now." She lifted Lunarpine up off the floor 
and floated him up so he was now eye level with her. She 
smiled. "What do you think?" 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> "He was taken by a group called the trainers. They turned him 
against 
> the other Maximals and named him Slayer." Lunarpine was angry ay 
> himself for letting Slayer escape he should have finished him when 
he 
> turned his back. Lunarpine wanted to personally butcher the entire 
> Trainer unit but knew that he wouldn't have the chance for a while. 
> He decided to change the subject. "So how good are you at 
controlling 
> your powers?"
>
